name: UNVEILED / LIVE NUDE
description: Is it a coincidence that an anagram of UNVEILED is LIVE NUDE? Probably, but I thought it was time to add a little sex appeal to the book. Sex sells right? But in all seriousness, there really is a certain sensuality to how the lines caress and intertwine with each other as if in the throes of passionate love. There is a truth about a live nude being unveiled. To get naked or nude, one needs to disrobe and reveal their birthday suit to whomever or to no one, thus unveiling in a sense. Hopefully one day the world will be a home to only sex positive people and zero body shaming. It's sad that so many people have hang-ups about sex and/or talking about it. Sex is one of the most nature things a human being can do; it's what made most of us. Be part of the conversation. Be part of humanity. Be part of what makes you unique. Listen to our bodies; our hearts, our minds; our loins.
